title: Tomato Confit
synopsis: There once lived two brothers in a town. The elder lived alone. The younger lived with his parents. They did not get along well, did neither badly. They called each other occasionally. The elder one was impatient and emotional and does nothing but work. The younger one goes steadily his way. One day the elder brother’s face turned into a tomato… (Source: Geidai Animation)

title: Ai wo Komete
synopsis: A little girl brings home a plant of cherry tomato which she raised with plenty of love. Will the happy days of the girl and cherry tomatoes begin? (Source: AniDB)
background: A short independent animation from April 2015. It was the debut work from Shiori Mizutani.

title: Eiyuuou, Bu wo Kiwameru Tame Tenseisu: Soshite, Sekai Saikyou no Minarai Kishi♀
synopsis: King Inglis, who lived for his country and people, strongly hoped to further temper my skills as a knight in his next life. The wish is heard by the goddess, who reincarnates the king into the far future, but in the form of a cute girl! However, it is declared at the age of six that she is incapable of being a knight, despite coming from a line of knights. (Source: MU, edited)

details.Synonyms: The King of Heroes reincarnates to polish his skill to the limit and becomes the strongest knight in training in the world♀

title: Idol Shin'eitai
synopsis: Idol Shin'eitai is an original song available to play in Project SEKAI: Colorful Stage, and is associated with the unit MORE MORE JUMP!. The song is produced, composed and written by Mitchie M and features two versions, one by MORE MORE JUMP! and a VOCALOID version that includes modified backup lyrics and features vocals by Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Megurine Luka and MEIKO. (From Project SEKAI COLORFUL STAGE feat. Hatsune Miku Wiki)

title: Getter Robo Arc
synopsis: Getter Robo Arc is the fifth Getter Robo series chronologically. Taking place several years after Getter Robo Go, Earth is now a post-apocalyptic world. Hayato, now an aging scientist, has completed Professor Saotome's masterpiece, Getter Robo Arc. Piloting it are Ryoma's son Takuma, the human-dinosaur Kamui, and the younger brother of Tayel, Baku. Alongside the reformed Dinosaur Empire, they fight the insectoid Andromeda Flow Country attacking from across time and space. (Source: MAL News)

title: Hamigaki Ondo
synopsis: Music video for the song Hamigaki Ondo by Japanese singer TARAKO that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Hiroshi Nishimura.

title: Ayanami Rei, Hajimete no Kuchibeni
synopsis: Lipstick advertisement involving Rei Ayanami.

details.Japanese: 綾波レイ、はじめての口紅

title: Misaki no Mayoiga
synopsis: 17-year-old Moeka, who lost her parents, and Yurie, seeking to escape her violent husband, got off at a Kitsunezaki station one day. The great earthquake and tsunami had changed their destinies. Their lives were saved, but they were perplexed when asked about their identities at an evacuation site. It was an old woman named Kiwa Yamana who lent them a helping hand. From that day, Yurie was known as Yui, Moeka as Hiyori, and together with Kiwa, the three women began a wonderful communal life together at the old house "Mayoiga" overlooking the sea. (Source: MAL News)

title: Bakuten!!
synopsis: The story follows Shoutarou Futaba, a boy who's fascinated with men's rhythmic gymnastics and enrolled at the Ao High School to join the school's team. The story follows a team of unique seniors and Yoshiya Misato, a classmate who's famous in high school rhythmic gymnastics tournaments, who run together toward one goal. (Source: MAL News)

title: Hikari no Ou
synopsis: Hikari no Ou takes place in the aftermath of humanity's last war. The world is enveloped with a black forest and people have become infected with a pathogen that causes them to burst into flame in the presence of natural fire. The only safe source of fire can be obtained by hunting black beasts, Flame Spirits, which reside deep in the forest. Among the fire hunters, rumors of "The King of Fire Hunters" began spreading recently—an individual who would be able to harvest the man-made star, the millennium comet that once wandered the void. The story revolves around Touko, a village-raised girl, and Koushi, a former student in the capital. The encounter between the two, who were not supposed to cross paths, will change the fate of the world. (Source: MAL News)

title: Nemui Inu
synopsis: Music video for the song Nemui Inu by Osamu Sakata that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Masahiko Adachi.

title: Hula Fulla Dance
synopsis: Natsunagi Hiwa, a novice, jumps into the world of Hula Girl after her sister. (Source: MAL News)
background: Hula Fulla Dance is set at the Spa Resort Hawaiians with the aim to revitalize Iwaki after the 2011 Tohoku earthquake and tsunami.

title: Cestvs: The Roman Fighter
synopsis: 54 AD. Cestus, a young boy orphaned by the Roman empire and made a slave, is placed into a training school for pugilists. It is here that he begins his journey to defy fate and fight for his own freedom. (Source: MAL News)

details.Synonyms: Kentou Ankokuden Cestv, Cestus: The Legend of Boxing in the Dark Ages

title: Night Head 2041
synopsis: The story follows the Kirihara brothers who from a young age were incarcerated in a secure scientific facility due to their supernatural powers, having escaped after the barrier that was preventing them malfunctions. The story also follows the Kuroki brothers who are trying to chase the Kirihara brothers. (Source: MAL News)

title: Gifts
synopsis: Music video for the song Gifts by Japanese rock band Superfly that featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Ryoya Kaga.

title: Penguin Minna Kyou Dai 2020
synopsis: Music video directed by Yoshiki Imazu for the short version of Masashi Sada's song Penguin Minna Kyou Dai 2020 that was included on his album "Raison d'être". The song is a remake of his 1997 single about stopping CO2 emissions. The 2020 song expands on this message to include the broader Sustainable Development Goals proposed by the United Nations.

details.Japanese: ペンギン皆きょうだい2020

title: Eoneu Nal Jameseo Kkaeeoboni Bagelyeoga Doeeo Isseotda
synopsis: Bong Gi used to have dreams of making something of his life. But now all that seems like a distant memory. He has become fat, lazy, unemployed, and altogether unlovable. In the real world, people are grossed out by him. He has never had a girlfriend and he spends his late nights fantasizing about women whose pictures he leers at on the internet. His own life appalls him, but he has one escape – his online life. Gaming has become his everything, and he excels at it. After another long, lonely night of gaming, he wakes up – and is shocked to find that he has transformed into a woman. Or to be more precise, a woman who looks a lot like those he used to lust after online! Confused, he does not know where to turn – so looks for answers on the net. He encounters a young woman in a chat forum named Sae Mi, who offers him advice. He soon falls for her charms – which makes things complicated to say the least. And things get even more bizarre when he attempts to take revenge on Sang Woo, a school bully who turns out to be Sae Mi’s older brother! (Source: Viki)

details.Synonyms: When I Woke Up I Became a Bagel Girl
details.Japanese: 어느 날 잠에서 깨어보니 베이글녀가 되어 있었다

title: Glass: The Movie
synopsis: "Autumn---, in that afternoon classroom---, I fell in love with her at first sight." One fall night afterschool - the main character Sakurai - is told to stay behind by class president Shirokawa Yui. Not only does she lecture him, but she even challenges him. He has no choice but to accept, but while accepting her challenge one thing leads to another and things turn out the way he’d never expect them too…https://hanime.tv/videos/hentai/glass-the-movie

title: Knight of Erin
synopsis: Erin is a mercenary who was once on the brink of death, but saved by Nighthawk a sword spirit. Since then they have been traveling together, this is the story of these two. (Source: Hanime)

details.Synonyms: Knight of Erin: Erin and Nighthawk

title: Bihua Li De Gushi
synopsis: The film is based on the three murals of "Overcoming Drought, Flood, and Wind" in Anhui farmers' paintings, telling the story of farmers overcoming natural disasters and winning agricultural harvests. Although the film has the exaggeration of the square satellites characteristic of the Great Leap Forward period, such as the grain piled like a hill, a pepper is carried by two people, and a cabbage is pulled by a cart, it infinitely magnifies the concept of man conquering the sky, but the creator can paint farmers The characteristics of simplicity, childishness, and exaggeration of humanity, creative integration and use, coordination and unity of style, are also innovative in style and style, and have gained certain experience in the creation of realistic themes in national forms.(translated from douban)

title: Diao Longji
synopsis: A long time ago, in the depths of Diancang Mountain, Dali, Yunnan, in the mysterious and gloomy Black Dragon Pool, there was an evil sow dragon hidden. Every three years, it rushes to the world, calling for rain, making waves, and harming the people. Even in the normal season, once someone approaches the Black Dragon Pool, they will be killed by the sow dragon. Master Yang, a carpenter of the Bai nationality, passed by with his son Qijin. When Qijin was looking for water for his father, he was dragged into the Black Dragon Pool by a sow. The grieving Master Yang heard that the nearby villagers were suffering from the poison, so he decided to get rid of the sow dragon. He and a pair of little brothers and sisters whose parents were dead both carve the wooden dragon carefully, preparing it to fight the sow dragon. The sow dragon is cunning and versatile. Can Master Yang and the others get rid of this vicious beast? 　　 This film is adapted from the folk myths and legends of ethnic minorities.(translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 1959.This anime won Silver Award at the 2nd Bucharest International Puppet Film Festival in Romania.

title: Shihang
synopsis: The blue sea is rippling, and seagulls skimmed across the sea lightly, flying freely on the water. A white sea vessel is advancing through the waves. This is my country’s first 10,000-ton sea vessel "Democracy 15" in trial voyage. At the moment of National Day approaching, the "Democracy 15th" completed more than 40 hours of sea trials, and my country's first 10,000-ton round trial production was successful. Director Liu and Master Wang Wanshui stood on the slipway and recalled the past more than three months ago. At that time, the ship was still an empty shell. The 3000-horsepower internal combustion engine ordered from abroad has not arrived yet, and our country is temporarily unable to manufacture it. The ship has been soaked in water for more than eight months and has not been able to start construction. Director Liu I was very anxious. One day, he was dragged by Master Wang Wanshui to read a poster with big characters...(translated from douban)

title: Shan Ya Zi
synopsis: At the beginning of the Second Revolutionary Civil War, in a small mountain village at the junction of the red zone and the white zone in the Jinggangshan area, Shanyaozi and his friends were playing firecrackers. Suddenly, there was a burst of intensive gunfire in the distance. Due to the betrayal of the traitor Zhang Sishui, Shanyaozi's mother was seriously injured. Before she died, her mother handed over the task of delivering important information to Shanyazi. However, Yamayako was also arrested by the enemy. The White Legion always thought that Shanyao could be deceived when he was young, so it set a trap and instructed the traitor to pretend to be a trafficman in our Xinlong base area and pretend to rescue Shanyao to obtain information. Shanyao believed that it was true, and was almost deceived. Fortunately, he saw Zhang Sishui stabbing a green snake mark on his right arm and recognized Zhang Sishui as a traitor. Later, under the cover of her little friend, Shan Yazi avoided the enemy's eyes and ears and obtained intelligence in the bamboo forest. However, the old treacherous and slippery traitor caught up again and forced the mountain maiden up the steep cliff. Shan Yazi was anxious to be wise, tied the firecrackers to the tail of the cow and rang, dispelled the three white dogs chasing him, and killed the traitor hanging on the old vine tree by the cliff with a hatchet, and then sent the intelligence safely. To the Xinlong base.(translated from douban)

title: Liang Zhi Xiao Kongque
synopsis: On the banks of the picturesque Lancang River in Xishuangbanna, Yanla, a little Dai boy wearing a red scarf, and his younger brother Ezabon have just finished picking water from the river and are about to send him home to Grandpa Bo Jingen. They met a rider on a tall horse. The PLA's high platoon leader is full of admiration. The relatives of the People’s Liberation Army drove away the reactionaries, built reservoirs for local compatriots, improved their lives, and did countless good deeds. The Yanla brothers hoped to learn from the People's Liberation Army to do good deeds. When they were cutting horse grass in the wild, they accidentally received two big eggs they had never seen before. They asked the beautiful and kind-hearted sister Yibo, and planned to use the hen to hatch the eggs to give birth to ducks. When the ducks grow up, they will regenerate eggs and then give them to the PLA uncle to eat. After a long wait, the egg hatched successfully, but two little peacocks emerged from the shell. From Grandpa Bo Jingen, they heard a touching legend about peacocks... 　　 This film is based on the story of the same name.(translated from douban)

title: Kongque De Yanhuo
synopsis: The arrival of the beautiful peacock fairy attracted many small animals, and the little rabbit had to lie on the bed due to illness. After Peacock Fairy turned the waterfall into a mirror, everyone admired her ability. The blue peacock, red peacock and little cardinal wanted to worship her as a teacher. Peacock fairies who were willing to accept disciples wanted them to dress up and come back at night. The beautiful one will be her apprentice. While the blue cardinals and red peacocks were carefully dressed up, the kind little peacock almost plucked out his feathers because of helping other small animals, and because he helped the little rabbit find herbs for curing diseases, it also failed to appear on time. Everyone hangs a heart for it.(translated from douban)

title: Xiao Dan Ke
synopsis: After the chick broke out of the shell, he kicked the eggshell into the corner as "trash". The little eggshell was unwilling to be "trash" and shook his sleeping brothers and sisters to wake up. They all persuaded him to give up, because The eggshell has no arms or legs. When Little Eggshell was dreaming about it, Granny Wuyun offered to help it. 　　 On the way, a small eggshell was mistaken for an egg by a big mouse. When he saw that it was a "waste" eggshell, the mouse, who felt he had been played around, decided to take it home as a rice bucket. It rained heavily, and the eggshell became the mouse's eyes, and later it became a boat for the mouse to cross the river. It was at this time that it got rid of the mouse by wit, and the mouse fell into the rapids. After the rain, the eggshell was picked up by the children and painted as a nice toy. While playing happily with other toys, it met the mouse again, and it turned out that it was not drowned. (translated from douban)
